description:
Aiko`s uncle is revealed to have staged his accident in order to convince his niece to quit her job as a private investigator.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abunai Tanteigokko! Ojou-san ni Python o (Kouhen)
Dangerous Detective Game: A Python for the Lady (Part 2)
あぶない探偵ごっこ! お嬢さんにパイソンを (後編)
